product_name: Merrell Jungle Moc Dual Strap Junior Shoes - Toddler Girls'/Girls'
long_description: The toddler girls'/girls' Merrell Jungle Moc Dual Strap Junior shoes are easy to get on and off of growing feet and offer great comfort for daily adventuring. Suede leather uppers feature moisture-wicking Nylex(R) nylon linings to help keep feet dry. Dual-strap rip-and-stick closures offer quick and easy adjustability. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps fight odors. Removable EVA footbeds and EVA midsoles with air pods under heels supply plenty of cushioning. Molded nylon arch shanks provide support and stability. Merrell Jungle Moc Dual Strap Junior shoes feature nonmarking rubber outsoles for traction on varied surfaces.
short_description: The toddler girls'/girls' Merrell Jungle Moc Dual Strap Junior shoes are easy to get on and off of growing feet and offer great comfort for daily adventuring.
